name: Ship X Bubbles (AmyFoosh)
description:
This is the first game I make for android!

It's been a long time since I started it, about 5 or 6 months. And, although it seems like a very simple game, it takes a lot of work and dedication. Give it a try, please!

Consider to be a patreon for supporting updates and more games!

JOJO!

Link:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.AylessNoyressShipXBubbles&fbclid=IwAR0f5eyH6kVoL1sTemwDxeHTZcft5gNTAOM379GxPCsWIE1Y8r-2M7ZgZFI

Features:

-Simple Gameplay.

-Bosses, many bosses!

-Delicious music!

-Fun story to pass the time with Amy.

-Skins to change visual gameplay.

-Leaderboards.

-Multiple language support.
